HelpDef.label: Colored Lights
HelpDef.description: Buildings which support colored lights will offer buttons to change the light color as well as share the color with other lights when the appropriate research is complete.

HelpDef.label: Neighbourly Growers
HelpDef.description: Hydroponics which are neighbourly growers support sharing the sowed plant with other neighbourly growers allowing you to set one building and then use a button to share it.
